channel.title: LIN Tzu Chun (Ryan)
channel.description: Recent content on LIN Tzu Chun (Ryan)

item.title: Sportportal: GYM Number Prediction - 2020 Datathon
item.description: I always grab any chance to get hands-on experience also try to solve a real problem. Recently, my 2 ex-colleagues at gogoro with me joined in 2020 Datathon, like a workshop. I am writing to share my steps and the solution! Before Coding In the begining, we don’t limit our thoughts on data the host provides, then we come up with so many ideas. That’s to say, the host provides invoice data, weather data, and internet posts, therefore people no doubt do analysis on the relationship between weather and consumption habits.

item.title: Insights
item.description: Business Perspective 2020-06-20 捨棄YouBike 2.0，為什麼新北市選擇無樁式共享自行車系統呢？ 2020-06-05 家樂福併購頂好、Jasons加速超市通路電商化？ 2020-04-16 用Tableau互動圖表來看台灣旅遊業二次重創! Film/Book Review 2020-06-29 普立茲記者｜擲地有聲的不只是報導，更是身為記者的份量 2020-06-05 誰是被害者｜被忽視的他們，需要的只是社會一次的回頭
